Utilizing Javascript to allow the user agent to look for a create an assertion for FIDO Authentication.
Presenting an interactive end user screen while the user attempts to authenticate through the PingID Mobile Application
Checking which type of time out the user experienced, if this was a Time Out with the mobile application. Allowing the user to retry to attempt with the OTP code from the App
If allowed, allowing the user to type in the OTP from the Mobile App. While also allowing a retry if there was an error with the PingID Mobile App
Allowing for multiple different method and handling those appropriately.  Whether that is attempting to use the code, trying another PingID mobile Push, or canceling to try a new device
Created the appropriate Device Auth based on the device selected previously.
